text:
Elizabeth Anne Holmes (born February 3, 1984) is a former American businesswoman. She was the founder and CEO of Theranos, a now-defunct health technology company.
In 2015, "Forbes" had named Holmes the youngest and wealthiest self-made female billionaire in America.
In 2016, it was accused of fraud about Theranos' claims, "Forbes" had revised its estimate of Holmes' net worth to zero.
"Fortune" had named her one of the "World's Most Disappointing Leaders".
